1131160.name: Civil: The Game
1131160.description:
A world of endless possibilities. Start your digital life in this next generation MMO! Play with friends, work your way to the top, and be your best!

Civil is a Life Simulation Platform. Join a welcoming open world game where players can live the digital lives they’ve always wanted. Players are encouraged to play together, make friends, and find a career path that can lead them anywhere. All kinds of careers can be pursued in Civil, for example: culinary jobs, public jobs, political jobs, and even criminal jobs! Using a point system based on "karma," you can even promote up to mayor of the town! Be careful if your karma falls too low - you might become a criminal!

Players can kill other players with weapons. Players can also run people over with vehicles, so watch your back if you have a high karma score!

In this game, you're encouraged to be you. Live life the way YOU want! Customize your character, buy clothes, and show off to your friends! This is Civil: The Game. Your digital life awaits.
1131160.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
